data.title: Curtis, George W
data.meta_description: PRUE AND I by CURTIS, George W and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Soft cover. Condition: Good / Very Good. First Paperback Ed. & 1st Printing!. I Wrote A Song With A Dead Man; Do You "Talk" In Your Dreams?; Our Clocj Chimed Death; Your Next Four Weeks ** ARTICLES AND STORIES (1) Our Clocks Chimed Death by W.W. Bathlot (2) Do You "Talk" In Your Dreams? By Geoffrey A. Dudley, B.A (3) The Haunted Orchard by William M. Sorenson (4) Fortune in Your Name? by George Cardinal LeGross (5) Séance Finds Missing Girl by Frank Hill (6) Van We Travel in Space? By Nandor Fodor (7) Where should YOU live? by John Naylor (8) Riddle of the Senaca Cremation by Nora Ball (9) True Strange Experiences by J.S. Roberts (10) Are there Ghost Trains? By Albert Parry (11) I wrote a Song with A Dead Man by Carl O. Bergner (12) They WILL Come Home by Richard H. Dillon (13) Can Hypnotism harm? By Curtis Fudler (14) Your Ships will take Rome! By M.Atkinson, F.S.C, S.R.C >> Creasing to cover; wearing of cover Size: 12mo - over 6¾" - 7¾" tall. Book.

Leatherbound. Condition: NEW. Leather Binding on Spine and Corners with Golden leaf printing on spine. Bound in genuine leather with Satin ribbon page markers and Spine with raised gilt bands. A perfect gift for your loved ones. Reprinted from 1892 edition. NO changes have been made to the original text. This is NOT a retyped or an ocr'd reprint. Illustrations, Index, if any, are included in black and white. Each page is checked manually before printing. As this print on demand book is reprinted from a very old book, there could be some missing or flawed pages, but we always try to make the book as complete as possible. Fold-outs, if any, are not part of the book. If the original book was published in multiple volumes then this reprint is of only one volume, not the whole set and contains approximately 8 pages. IF YOU WISH TO ORDER PARTICULAR VOLUME OR ALL THE VOLUMES YOU CAN CONTACT US. Resized as per current standards. Sewing binding for longer life, where the book block is actually sewn (smythe sewn/section sewn) with thread before binding which results in a more durable type of binding. Language: English.

Taschenbuch. Condition: Neu. nach der Bestellung gedruckt Neuware - Printed after ordering - The Correspondence of John Lothrop Motley - Volume 1, Second Edition is an unchanged, high-quality reprint of the original edition of 1889.Hans Elektronisches Buch is editor of the literature on different topic areas such as research and science, travel and expeditions, cooking and nutrition, medicine, and other genres. As a publisher we focus on the preservation of historical literature. Many works of historical writers and scientists are available today as antiques only. Hans Elektronisches Buch newly publishes these books and contributes to the preservation of literature which has become rare and historical knowledge for the future.
